instructions: move the dinner plate to the center of the table cloth
put the salad plate in the center of the dinner plate
put the napkin in the center of the salad plate
put the wine glass to the top right corner of the table cloth
put the water glass to the bottom right of the wine glass
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner plate
put the dinner fork to the right of the salad fork
put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate
put the soup spoon to the right of the knife
